text:
課程內容：
- iOS 18.1 重點 AI 功能（如：寫作工具、訊息智慧回覆及相片清除工具等）
- 相機控制按鈕使用技巧
- 人氣 AI 工具推薦及教學
立即報名*： [redacted_url]
成功報名及出席將送您 (全速1GB) 5G 數據漫遊日數通行證一張^。
*每人只限出席一場。 ^名額有限，先到先得，受條款及細則約束。 參考編號：[redacted_id]。 香港移動通訊有限公司-鰂魚涌太古坊電訊盈科中心十四樓。 查詢/取消：[redacted_number]
trans:
Course content:
- iOS 18.1 major AI features (for example, writing tools, smart message replies, photo cleaning tools, etc.)
- Tips on using the camera control buttons
- Popular AI tool recommendations and tutorials
Register now*: [redacted_url]
With a successful registration and attendance, you will receive a 5G data roaming day pass (full speed 1GB) ^.
*One visit per person. ^Limited availability, first come first served, and subject to terms and conditions. Reference ID: [redacted_id]. CSL Mobile Limited - 14F, PCCW Tower, Taikoo Place, Quarry Bay. Query/Cancellation: [redacted_number]
